other_tests.findings: Extensive tumor necrosis and lymphocytic infiltration; increased expression of Melan-A and CD8 T cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased expression of Melan-A and CD8-positive T lymphocytes compared to pretreatment specimens.

other_tests.findings: Used to treat three brain metastases.
other_tests.changes_over_time: MRI showed nearly complete resolution of the brain masses 11 months after treatment.
